div.div: at New Wilmington, Pa. | Harold Burry Stadium

tr.td: Toss won by Westminster. Defered. Lycoming receives, defends North EZ.
Change of possession, WES ball on WES30, 1st and 10.
Zac Henry kickoff 53 yards to the LYCO17, Craig Needhamme return 17 yards to the LYCO34 (Justin Smith).
Zach Klinger pass complete to Jarrin Campman for 10 yards to the LYCO44, 1ST DOWN LYCO (Derrick Orloski).
Zach Klinger pass incomplete to Greg Kovacs.

Zach Klinger pass incomplete to Sean Saylor.
